attributes.action: Don't Build On Yew Tree Farm, Burscough!
attributes.additional_details:
The local council are threatening to build over 100 more houses in Burscough on Yew Tree Farm. It's not just a few more houses it is another town! We don't want more people crowding the town of Burscough, we are happy with the way it is. On the other hand, if more houses were build this would mean that there would be less homeless people.

Sign this petition if you don't want another town build on Yew Tree Farm, Burscough!
